doc.title: Costume Heroines in Bondage Peril!
doc.plot: Irresistible costume-clad beauties find themselves in tight bondage. One of Santa's prettier helpers finds herself tied and gagged in her fur-trimmed red dress. A busty cheerleader is tied to a bedpost along with an undercover cop. A crooked manager makes off with a sack of cash leaving a perky country singer tied and silenced. A beautiful gambler finds out that being lucky and good isn't enough - you have to watch out for crooked opponents who steal back their lost money and leave their opponent roped and writhing on the floor. A superheroine is captured and placed in deadly peril, but manages to escape the death trap and leaves the villainess bound and gagged. Finally, two lovely ladies hosting a costume party are grabbed by a housebreaker who quickly ties and silences the hostesses.
